```{r load-packages, echo = FALSE, include = FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(mapview)
library(readr)
```


```{r load-data, echo = FALSE}
KVRLP_Impfpraxen_fuer_FremdpatientInnen_geocoded <-
  readr::read_rds(
    "./data/KVRLP_Impfpraxen_fuer_FremdpatientInnen_geocoded.rds"
  )

KVRLP_Impfpraxen_fuer_FremdpatientInnen_geocoded <-
  KVRLP_Impfpraxen_fuer_FremdpatientInnen_geocoded %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(
    label = paste0(Name, ", ", Straße, " ", Ort)
  )


```

```{r map, echo = FALSE}
mapview::mapview(
  KVRLP_Impfpraxen_fuer_FremdpatientInnen_geocoded["label"],
  legend = FALSE
)
```
